sen.j: 化政文化にはさらに演出が変化し、黒服で天狗の面をつけていた者がいきなり豪華な衣装の盗賊に代わるなど、演技の途中で役者の衣装を引きぬいて別の人物に変えるといった視覚的な変化を追究するようになった。
sen.e: In the Kasei (1804 - 1928) culture era, the way of the performance changed further, seeking such visual changes that a costume of an actor on the stage was removed during his performance to alter his role to that of another person: For example, the actor who wore a face mask for a tengu (long-nosed goblin) in a black costume suddenly changed into a bandit in a gorgeous costume.
